https://newsfilter.io/a/73f7eecd61cbaec68b19ed9d52a66f7c

$AVGO New Press Release:  
  
Broadcom Inc. Announces Pricing Terms of its Private Exchange Offers of Certain Outstanding Notes for New Notes 
  
Broadcom Inc. (Nasdaq: AVGO) ("Broadcom" or the "Company") announced today the pricing terms of the Company's new notes due 2037 (the "New Notes") to be issued in connection with its offers to eligible holders (the "Exchange Offers") of the Company's or its subsidiaries' Existing Notes listed in the table below (the "Existing Notes") to exchange Existing Notes (subject to, among others, the acceptance priority levels) for consideration consisting of a combination of up to $2,500,000,000 (the "Notes Cap") aggregate principal amount of the New Notes and a cash payment, the complete terms and conditions of which are set forth in an offering memorandum, dated March 31, 2022 (the "Offering Memora (...)

$AVGO Look! I got this 100% Profitability across  4 trades in 1 month. Current rating is Bearish. Now I will wait for Buy signal...
$MA $HD $KO  💚🧞‍♂️💚.  🤑.  $TSM $AVGO . V.    V.

$TSM $NVDA $AVGO $AMD The market sentiment right now is to sell tech and buy commodities and defensive stocks.  The pendulum is swinging with all the momentum in that direction.  The Don believes the existing momentum is beginning to create a crowded trade that will eventually lead to another rotation that will benefit oversold tech stocks that have strong branding power and little debt (companies with high levels of debt will continue to be vulnerable as the cost of money increases).  If/when that will happen is anyone's guess but we will check back in a few months and see if The Don is correct.
